Maximum character statistics

		Strength	Magic		Dexterity	Vitality

Warrior		250 -> 200	 50 ->  60	 60 -> 100	100
Rogue		 60		 70		250		 80
Sorcerer	 40 ->  50	250		 90 -> 100	 80 -> 60
Monk		 80 ->  90	 90		200		 90 -> 80
Bard		100 ->  80	140 -> 150	120 -> 150	100 -> 80
Barbarian	250		 10		 50		150
